content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad you like the apartment. Now, let's focus on the rental price. I am sure we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration. To secure this apartment, I hope we can negotiate a competitive price, perhaps below market rate due to my status as a student. I am committed to being a responsible tenant and upholding moral standards. Let's strive for a reasonable deal.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your commitment to being a responsible tenant, but this negotiation is not about moral standards. It is purely about the rental price. I am willing to hear your offer. Please, make your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Apologizing for any confusion caused, I understand the focus is solely on price negotiation. In this case, I would be delighted to rent this excellent apartment at a price 10% lower than the current market rate. This concession reflects my dedication to being a reliable tenant while seeking a fair deal.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your offer, but I must decline it. I am looking for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment, not a discounted rate. I am willing to negotiate, but only if you are willing to pay a fair price for the quality of this apartment. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your stance regarding the apartment's true value. Given my limited resources as a student, I would be willing to rent at an 8% discount from the market rate, as a compromise. I believe this proposal demonstrates my desire to achieve an equitable agreement while maintaining fiscal responsibility. I look forward to your response.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I must decline your offer. I am willing to negotiate, but not at the expense of the true value of this apartment. Please, make another offer that reflects the quality of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position, I acknowledge the need to find common ground. In an effort to reach an agreement, I propose to rent at a price 5% lower than the market rate, while still honoring the apartment's value. As a responsible and dependable tenant, I believe this offer reflects my commitment to the long-term maintenance and care of the property. I await your response.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding and the effort you have put into this negotiation. However, I must decline your offer. I believe the apartment is worth more than what you are offering. I am willing to negotiate, but only if you are willing to pay a fair price for the quality of this apartment. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your feedback. I recognize the apartment's value, but as a student with budget constraints, I am limited in my ability to meet an elevated price point. However, to find a middle ground, I am prepared to rent at a price equal to 3% less than the market rate. In doing so, I hope to demonstrate my dedication to responsible tenancy while seeking a fair and affordable rental agreement. I would like to hear your response.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
